siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Everyone has a secret they want to hide."Banana" will be your reliable friend. With Banana, you can manage all your secrets such as videos, photos, web links. that you don't want anyone to see. Banana provide you a delicious experience with a clean design.
blogPost.body: Everyone has a secret they want to hide."Banana" will be your reliable friend. With Banana, you can manage all your secrets such as videos, photos, web links. that you don't want anyone to see. Banana provide you a delicious experience with a clean design.
blogPost.title: Banana - Keep your secrets hidden and safe.
blogPost.author: Packn

localize.description: 每个人都有自己想要隐藏的秘密，"Banana "将是你可靠的朋友。有了Banana，你可以管理你所有的秘密，如视频，照片，网页链接等，你不想让任何人看到。香蕉 "以简洁的设计为您提供美味的体验。
localize.tagline: 把你的秘密隐藏起来，保证安全。

localize.description: 每個人都有自己想要隱藏的祕密，"Banana "將是你可靠的朋友。有了Banana，你可以管理你所有的祕密，如視頻，照片，網頁鏈接等，你不想讓任何人看到。香蕉 "以簡潔的設計爲您提供美味的體驗。
localize.tagline: 把你的祕密隱藏起來，保證安全。

previous.excerpt: The "frosted glass" effect has been with us for quite some time with each company having its own name for it. In Nov 2020 Mike Malewicz wrote a medium article trying to unify it under one name. Then we created this handy CSS generator. Enjoy!
previous.title: Glassmorphism CSS Generator - Generate the CSS for frosted glass effect for free.

localize.description: "磨砂玻璃 "效果已经陪伴我们走过了相当长的时间，每个公司都有自己的名字。2020年11月，Mike Malewicz写了一篇媒介文章，试图将它统一在一个名字下。然后我们创建了这个方便的CSS生成器。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 免费生成磨砂玻璃效果的CSS。

localize.description: "磨砂玻璃 "效果已經陪伴我們走過了相當長的時間，每個公司都有自己的名字。2020年11月，Mike Malewicz寫了一篇媒介文章，試圖將它統一在一個名字下。然後我們創建了這個方便的CSS生成器。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 免費生成磨砂玻璃效果的CSS。

next.excerpt: askBetty gives Slack users instant access to a live personal assistant who can complete bite-sized admin or concierge-type tasks. Through a tailored one-to-one conversation, Betty can: review copy, source quotes, secure dinner reservations & more!
next.title: askBetty - Instant access to a live virtual assistant through Slack

localize.description: askBetty为Slack用户提供了即时访问一个活生生的私人助理的机会，他可以完成小规模的管理或礼宾型任务。通过量身定制的一对一对话，Betty可以：审阅文案、提供报价、确保晚餐预订等。
localize.tagline: 通过Slack即时访问实时虚拟助理。

localize.description: askBetty爲Slack用戶提供了即時訪問一個活生生的私人助理的機會，他可以完成小規模的管理或禮賓型任務。通過量身定製的一對一對話，Betty可以：審閱文案、提供報價、確保晚餐預訂等。
localize.tagline: 通過Slack即時訪問實時虛擬助理。
